entry.title: Valentine's Day 2014 Text Greetings, Messages Quotes
entry.content:
best Teddy Day 2014 Messages, Text Greetings, Sms

A kiss is a special thing…
that u can cant take wit-hout giving,
& u cant give wit-hout taking.
Enjoy kissing and kissing day.


best Teddy Day 2014 Messages, Text Greetings, Sms

Say that you love me
and that you can see
I have what you’ve longed for
and your place is with me.


Valentine's Day 2014 Text Greetings, Messages Quotes

My Lifes Beautiful Words I Ever Read..
“”We promise according to our hopes,,
and perform according to our fears. “”
Happy Promise Day

best Love Kiss 14th Febraury Valentines Day Text Greetings Messages Quotes

Look At Urself In The Mirror
And Slap Urself Hard.
And You Will Realize The Pain You Had Given Me Throughout.
Slap Day!! Mubarak….Tdak (Slap)


best Love Kiss 14th Febraury Valentines Day Text Greetings Messages Quotes

Cecil Beaton Says that…
More vareed dan any lands-cape…
waz di land-scape in-di sky…
wid is-lands of gold & silvr…
peninsulas of apricot & rose…
against a back-ground
of many shades of turquoise & azure….

I said…!!!
Right!!!!
Of course..!!!!
But you keep the promise anyway.
Thats what love is.???
Love is keeping the promise anyway..
Happy Promise Day…

entry.title: Happy Valentines Day Sms
entry.content:
best Happy Chocolate Day Greetings Wishes Messages For Lover, Girlfriend, Boyfriend

Le jour de la Saint-Valentin nous pensons à ceux
Qui font nos vies précieuses,
Ces charmants, des gens sympathiques qui
Nous pensons avec un sourire.
J’ai la chance de vous le savez,
C’est pourquoi je tiens à dire,
Pour une personne rare et spéciale:
Bonne Saint Valentin.
=====================================

best Happy Chocolate Day Greetings Wishes Messages For Lover, Girlfriend, Boyfriend

Meri Mohabbat Se Hamesha Muskarao Gay
Mere Siwa Aur Kiss Se Dil Lagao Gay
Kitna bhi chaho na bhol pao gay
Hum se jitna dur jao nazdik pao gay
Humein mita sakte ho to mita do yaadein meri
magar kya sapno se humein juda kar pao gay..
================================

Happy Valentines Day Sms

What is love?
LOVE
Is The
Condition
In Which
The Happiness
Of Another Person
Is
Essential
To Your Own
>>Wan walenthin mi khwam sukh<<
